en.bdb: ‘Sometimes He manifests in horses, sometimes in elephants, and sometimes in cows, ‘Sometimes He is there in birds and sometimes in flora,

verse.gurmukhi: pwvk hÍY dihXo khUM pOn rUp kihXo khUM cIq hÍY kY gihXo khUM pwnI hÍY kY bihXo hY ]
verse.unicode: ਪਾਵਕ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਦਹਿਯੋ ਕਹੂੰ ਪੌਨ ਰੂਪ ਕਹਿਯੋ ਕਹੂੰ ਚੀਤ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਕੈ ਗਹਿਯੋ ਕਹੂੰ ਪਾਨੀ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਕੈ ਬਹਿਯੋ ਹੈ ॥

en.bdb: ‘He burns in the shape of fire and then comes over as air, ‘Sometimes he dwells in the minds and sometimes flows in the shape of water.

en.bdb: ‘Sometimes comes down from heaven to annihilate Rawana (devil), ‘In the jungles, which is described in Vedas too.

ss.gurmukhi: ikqy (rwm vwg) bsqR auqwr ky jMgl ivc ivcrdw hoieAw rwvx dw sMGwr krdw hY, Aijhw vydw ivc iliKAw hY।
